title: AT-A-GLANCE 2018-2019 Academic Year Daily Appointment Book/Planner, Small, 4-7/8 x 8, Black (7080705)
features: ACADEMIC YEAR – Small planner covers 12 months from July 2018-June 2019, for those who prefer to plan on the academic calendar. Make the most of your year with clear and simple organization.
DAILY SCHEDULE – Quickly view your entire day on a single page. Each day is laid out with easy to follow ruled blocks. Perfect for keeping your plans neat and easy to read. Pages measure 4-7/8" x 8".
15-MINUTE APPOINTMENTS – Break your day into manageable 15-minute periods. Weekday times are available 7:00 a.m.-7:45 p.m. and Saturdays run 7:00 a.m.-4:45 p.m. Sundays are untimed for flexibility.
PROFESSIONAL DESIGN – Take charge of your schedule with classic style. Planner has a black cover and wirebound design to help keep pages secure for prolonged use.
ENHANCED PLANNING – Expand your organizational skills with specialized pages. Includes: 3 year reference calendar. Notes. Contacts.
description: Keep track of important deadlines, special events and more with clear and simple organization. This small planner covers 12 months from July 2018-June 2019, and is perfect for teachers, administrators or anyone who prefers to plan on the academic calendar. Quickly view your daily schedule on a single page. Each day is laid out with easy to follow ruled blocks. Perfect for keeping your plans neat and easy to read. Pages measure 4-7/8" x 8". You can also break your day into manageable 15-minute periods. Monday-Friday times are available 7:00 a.m.-7:45 p.m. for easy weekday planning. Saturdays run 7:00 a.m.-4:45 p.m. Sundays are untimed for weekend flexibility. Take charge of your schedule with classic style. Planner has a black cover and wirebound design to help keep pages secure for prolonged use. Expand your organizational skills with specialized pages. Includes: 3 year reference calendar. Notes. Contacts.
